description: The government also announces a ban on mink farms and on keeping killer whales in captivity.
title: France announces 'gradual' ban on wild animals in circuses
title_page: France announces 'gradual' ban on wild animals in circuses - BBC News
maintext: In addition to the measures, and starting immediately, Ms Pompili said France's three marine aquariums would no longer be able to breed or bring in new dolphins or orcas. No new marine aquariums would be built, she said.
